mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIME_SERIES_AP_STAGE ( SITE_ID, GROUP_ID, MEASUREMENT_DATE, FINAL_VALUE, MAIN_QUALIFIER_ID, DATA_APPROVAL_ID, SOURCE_ID ) SELECT SITE_ID, GROUP_ID, MEASUREMENT_DATE, FINAL_VALUE, NULL AS MAIN_QUALIFIER_ID, NULL AS DATA_APPROVAL_ID, SOURCE_ID FROM ()
mapper.sql: with old_site_last (old_site_final) as (select final_value old_site_final from TIME_SERIES_STAR ts where ts.site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and ts.group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and ts.measurement_date = to_timestamp(#{lastTimestamp,jdbcType=CHAR},'mm/dd/yyyy hh:mi:ss.ff AM') ) select ts.site_id, ts.group_id, ts.measurement_date, ts.final_value, #{sourceId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} as source_id from TIME_SERIES_STAR ts where ts.site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and ts.group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and ts.measurement_date <= to_timestamp(#{lastTimestamp,jdbcType=CHAR},'mm/dd/yyyy hh:mi:ss.ff AM') union select #{siteId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} site_id, ts.group_id, ts.measurement_date, ts.final_value + os.old_site_final final_value, #{sourceId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} as source_id from TIME_SERIES_STAR ts, old_site_last os where ts.group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and ts.site_id = #{newSiteId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and ts.measurement_date >= to_timestamp(#{firstTimestamp,jdbcType=CHAR},'mm/dd/yyyy hh:mi:ss.ff AM') order by measurement_date
